{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16697v1", "title": "On deciding transcendence of power series", "summary": "It is well known that algebraic power series are differentially finite
(D-finite): they satisfy linear differential equations with polynomial
coefficients. The converse problem, whether a given D-finite power series is
algebraic or transcendental, is notoriously difficult. We prove that this
problem is decidable: we give two theoretical algorithms and a transcendence
test that is efficient in practice.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT,cs.SC,math.CA", "published": "2025-04-23T13:28:05Z"}
